LinkItem.internal_link_text: Enable TCP/IP Network Protocol for SQL Server
Enable TCP/IP Network Protocol for SQL Server
Configure a Server to Listen on a Specific TCP Port
Configure a Server to Listen on a Specific TCP Port

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block:
USE [master] GO
/* Replace the PASSWORD in the following statement with a secure password. If you save this script, make sure that you secure the file to securely maintain the password. */ CREATE LOGIN [HybridConnectionLogin] WITH PASSWORD=N'<**secure_password**>', DEFAULT_DATABASE=[OnPremisesDB], DEFAULT_LANGUAGE=[us_english], CHECK_EXPIRATION=OFF, CHECK_POLICY=ON GO
USE [OnPremisesDB] GO
CREATE USER [HybridConnectionLogin] FOR LOGIN [HybridConnectionLogin] WITH DEFAULT_SCHEMA=[dbo] GO
GRANT CONNECT TO [HybridConnectionLogin] GRANT CREATE TABLE TO [HybridConnectionLogin] GRANT CREATE SCHEMA TO [HybridConnectionLogin] GO
